title: Hey Duggee - Summer Holiday Badge
cardDescription: The Summer Holiday Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 4 and has a scenery of the beach with a pink round frame.
description: The Summer Holiday Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 4 and has a scenery of the beach with a pink round frame.

content.content: Badge is worked as two half circles sewn together.

content: ch 2, 3 sc into 2nd ch from hook, turn [3]

content.content: Fasten off. Repeat 1-7 with MC2. Sew halves together using tail from the blue part.

content: attach pink to any sc, ch, (inc hdc, 6 hdc) x6, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.

content: sc to 2nd ch from hook, 2 sc, hdc, turn [4]

content.content: Fasten off and sew in place. Sew red flag on top of the castle.

content: with yellow, 4 sc into magic loop, slst

content.content: Sew in place and use the tail to sew sun rays.
Making this small piece with many yarns can be quite a mess. You can make corrections and tuck the stitches as needed when sewing in place.

content: with red ch 3, sc to 2nd ch from hook, slst to last ch with yellow, turn
ch, hdc to red sc, turn
with white ch, hdc, slst to yellow ch with purple, turn

content.content: Fasten off and sew in place using tails.
Sew the umbrella pole with dark blue.
